key_features.title: Industry-Relevant Curriculum
key_features.description: Regularly updated curriculum aligned with current industry trends, emerging technologies, and business practices to ensure you're industry-ready.

key_features.title: Experienced Faculty
key_features.description: Learn from seasoned academicians, industry professionals, and corporate experts who bring real-world insights to the classroom.

key_features.title: Live Industry Projects
key_features.description: Work on real-world business challenges through live consulting projects with leading companies across various sectors.

key_features.title: Global Exposure
key_features.description: International study tours, exchange programs, and global immersion opportunities to broaden your perspective.

key_features.title: Summer Internships
key_features.description: Paid internships in top-tier companies providing hands-on experience and industry connections.

key_features.title: Placement Support
key_features.description: Dedicated placement cell with 95%+ placement rate, connecting you with leading recruiters across industries.

key_features.title: Technology Integration
key_features.description: Access to advanced labs, AI tools, business analytics platforms, and digital learning resources.

key_features.title: Leadership Development
key_features.description: Structured leadership programs, mentorship opportunities, and soft skills training for holistic growth.

key_features.title: Innovation Labs
key_features.description: State-of-the-art innovation labs and centres of excellence in collaboration with industry partners.
